QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.CONDITION_OCCURRENCE_ID ,t.PERSON_ID ,t.CONDITION_CONCEPT_ID as CONCEPT_ID ,t.CONDITION_START_DATE as START_DATE ,t.CONDITION_END_DATE as END_DATE ,t.CONDITION_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID as TYPE_CONCEPT_ID FROM {sc}.CONDITION_OCCURRENCE as t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by t.PERSON_ID, t.CONDITION_OCCURRENCE_ID
